snippet.title: [3D Fan Game] SONIC THE HEDGEHOG Snowday [SAGE 2021] (SonicAmateurGamesExpo) Demo - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
My Winter themed 3D SONIC Fangame has a Playable Demo available on SONICFANGAMESHQ for SAGE2021.


SONICFANGAMESHQ Page Link : https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-the-hedgehog-snowday.1143/


Sonic The Hedgehog embarks on a Winter Trek high up in a Mountainous Region.
What awaits him on this Snowday?

Made with Unity 3D.

This 3D Sonic fan game aims to capture the thrills & depth of the Sonic Adventure games, while being a fun and easy to pick up and play type of game.

This isn't a physics-sim type of fangame, this fangame solely focuses on the Action and the free-form control when it comes to gameplay/level design.



I know it's the end of SAGE now, but I put together a Trailer to go alongside the last Demo release Build "V1.4".


This build has some Camera changes and a Camera options menu that allows you to set the zoom distance, camera-control invert, and a Smooth-Damping Toggle.


There's also minor Level Design changes.


I'd be glad to hear your thoughts after playing the latest build.
